text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As Symboli Rudolf helps the students<n>ease into
the new year, she receives the<n>news that Air
Groove has collapsed.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The reason turns out to be from<n>overwork, and
Rudolf blames herself for<n>letting Air Groove's
schedule get so out<n>of hand.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Air Groove snaps back, saying that<n>Rudolf
doesn't understand at all—words<n>that seem to
strike home.
